text: Jörg Schneider (7 February 1935 – 22 August 2015) was a Swiss stage and movie actor. He usually starred in Swiss German language cinema and television and stage productions. He was known for his Kasperle, Pumuckl and fairytale-radio plays records and adapted plays for the Swiss German language. Schneider died in Wetzikon from cancer, aged 80. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Jörg Schneider on the website of the Swiss television SRF Category:1935 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Switzerland Category:Actors from Zürich Category:Radio personalities Category:Swiss stage actors Category:Swiss movie actors
title: Jörg Schneider
